tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    customer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    order_quantity INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE historical_sales_data (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    sale_quantity INT,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
